Title: Disable Spacetime Vortex
Description:
Performance optimization mod that prevents NPCs from using Spacetime Vortex while keeping it available for the player.

• Reduces lag from NPC Spacetime Vortex activations
• Player can still use Spacetime Vortex normally
• Safe to add to existing saves
• Safe to remove
• Compatible with other mods
• Uses Harmony patching for reliability

GitHub: https://github.com/SattaRIP/CavesOfQud-DisableSpacetimeVortex
